ygData.msgSnippet: ... Date: Thu, 24 Jun 1999 12:04:26 -0500 From: Ian Goodale  Subject: Re: Digest Number 51 ... Looking at the spell Flare using the
ygData.messageBody:
----original message------

Date: Thu, 24 Jun 1999 12:04:26 -0500
From: Ian Goodale <chpicker@...>
Subject: Re: Digest Number 51

>From: Jordan <jordanis@...>
>Also, anyone else notice that FLARE no longer works?

Looking at the spell Flare using the Spell program I wrote, I noticed that
it no longer has a target type. So you can't target the spell. My guess
is that Verant just screwed it up. I will email them about it, if we want
to get their attention, we could all do it. It looks to me like it would
be a VERY easy fix, assuming the server doesn't have to be modified as
well. It is a single byte in the file that needs to be changed.

chpicker
Minister of Commerce, OCD
Veeshan
----end original message-----

Whooo hooo. FINALLY someone else who even acknowledges that it's broken ;) The typical response i get from people is... Flare? why even bother, it's a useless spell.... well personally i LIKE that spell (handy for leading friends to you in large outdoor zones) Not to mention that 4th of July is coming up.. where would we all be without a little fireworks :)

Meraxes Glibilskym, Fennin Ro
